mapper.select: SELECT F.FILE_ID AS fileId, V.VOLUME_TITLE AS volumeTitle,F.TITLE AS title,F.SUBJECT AS subject,F.FILE_TYPE AS fileType, F.PAGE_TOTAL AS pageTotal,F.SECRET_LEVEL AS secretLevel,F.SEND_ORG AS sendOrg FROM ARCHIVES_FILE F LEFT JOIN ARCHIVES_VOLUME V ON F.ORG_ID=V.ORG_ID AND F.VOLUME_ID=V.VOLUME_ID WHERE F.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND F.DESTORY_FLAG!='1' AND F.VOLUME_ID = #{volumeId}
